EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Reminder - Jan15 UK Activity Tracker
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Activity Tracker Webinar Starting in 30 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering for the Intapp Activity Tracker webinar. It will start in 30 minutes, at 2:00pm GMT.
To join the webinar:
URL: https://intappinc.webex.com/intappinc/onstage/g.php?MTID=ee5ba17e6dc3e94bab3a96a1ffd02d50a
Once you join the WebEx you will see the audio conference details. You may need to click on the “show all global call-in numbers” link to find your call-in number.
If you have any difficulties joining the WebEx, please send me an email.
Regards,
Lea Schweitzer Marketing Manager Intapp - Software for a Changing Legal Market
